Our people are now... ahem... I won't go there...
Create the Luftwaffe

Although our primary concerns are with holding power over the land, it is important that we are prepared for our enemies in the air, too. Let us create a formidable airforce that would protect our armies from above, and which shall assure our military supremacy further.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Nazi Germany [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have researched Flight [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward Air Units [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Newly trained Air Units begin with 20 additional XP

Although our primary concerns are with holding power over the land, it is important that we are prepared for our enemies in the air, too. Let us create a formidable airforce that would protect our armies from above, and which shall assure our military supremacy further.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward Air Units [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Newly trained Air Units begin with 20 additional XP
Adopt the Führerprinzip

The success of the state relies upon supreme leadership. Every man must be afforded absolute authority over their responsibilities, and absolute obediance by their subordinates. These principles shall ensure compliance with the will of our glorious Führer and with the German nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Nazi Germany [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Construct Constables and Police Stations 50% faster [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Constables and Police Stations yield +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness

The success of the state relies upon supreme leadership. Every man must be afforded absolute authority over their responsibilities, and absolute obediance by their subordinates. These principles shall ensure compliance with the will of our glorious Führer and with the German nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Construct Constables and Police Stations 50% faster [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Constables and Police Stations yield +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness
Demand for De-militarisation

An Ambassador from the {1_CivName} has approached us with an ultimatum: we reduce the size of our armed forces, or they denounce us to the world as a military threat. Clearly, the fools in {2_CivName} have recognised our superior power. It would be damning for them to even think of denouncing us.[NEWLINE]
Perhaps we should teach them a lesson.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]War is declared against the {1_CivName}[ENDCOLOR]
We have determined that the best course of action is by declaring war against the {1_CivName}.
Then we shall reduce the size of our arms... for now.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]All Military Units not garrisoned in a city are disbanded (unless of level 3 or higher)[ENDCOLOR]
We have agreed to the {1_CivName}'s demands that we must reduce the size of our forces.
They're bluffing...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance that {1_CivName} will denounce you[ENDCOLOR]
We have called the {1_CivName}'s bluff and stood by our armament. We knew they were too weak to denounce us.
As it so happens, the {1_CivName} was not bluffing and they have denounced our refusal to de-militarise. We shall teach them a lesson in time.
War has erupted between Germany and the {1_CivName} in defiance of {2_LeaderName}'s demands for Adolf Hitler to de-militarise.
Adolf Hitler of Germany has agreed to the demands of {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} and has pledged to de-militarise.
Adolf Hitler of Germany has called {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}'s bluff and they have failed to denounce Germany's armament as promised.
New Propaganda

New propaganda material has been drawn up ready to promote the glorious will of the Führer. What is only left is to determine what the Führer's glorious will is and how this propaganda should be directed.[NEWLINE]
Well, let me tell you...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person of your choice[ENDCOLOR]
We have been presented with new propaganda material.
Eva Braun
